data.title: Stratasys Secures $120 Million Investment from Fortissimo Capital to Boost Growth
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Stratasys ( (SSYS) ) just unveiled an announcement.

On February 2, 2025, Stratasys announced a $120 million equity investment from Fortissimo Capital, an Israeli private equity fund. This investment will allow Fortissimo to acquire approximately 15.5% of Stratasys’ ordinary shares, enhancing Stratasys’ financial position and supporting its growth strategy in the additive manufacturing sector. The partnership underscores confidence in Stratasys’ leadership and potential for long-term growth. The investment includes an 18-month lock-up period and standstill provisions, while Fortissimo’s Yuval Cohen is set to join Stratasys’ board, reflecting Fortissimo’s commitment to the company’s strategic direction.

More about Stratasys

Stratasys is a leader in the additive manufacturing industry, focusing on polymer 3D printing solutions. It provides innovative 3D printing technologies for industries such as aerospace, automotive, consumer products, and healthcare. Stratasys offers a range of smart and connected 3D printers, polymer materials, a software ecosystem, and parts on demand, aiming to transform product design, enhance manufacturing agility, and improve patient care.

YTD Price Performance: 7.01%

Average Trading Volume: 641,471

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Sell

Current Market Cap: $655.8M

An update from Ceres Global ( (TSE:CRP) ) is now available.

Ceres Global Ag Corp. announced that it will release its fiscal 2025 second quarter financial results on February 13, 2025, coinciding with a conference call led by its interim CEO and CFO. This announcement is pivotal as it provides stakeholders with insights into the company’s ongoing financial performance and strategic operations.

More about Ceres Global

Ceres Global Ag Corp. is a global company engaged in the agricultural, energy, and industrial products sectors, offering services in sourcing, storing, transporting, and marketing high-quality agricultural commodities and raw materials. The company operates a network of logistics centers and has significant storage capacities across locations in Saskatchewan, Manitoba, and Minnesota.

data.title: Exploits Discovery Extends High-Grade Gold Zone at Horseshoe
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

An announcement from Exploits Discovery ( (TSE:NFLD) ) is now available.

Exploits Discovery Corp., a company exploring gold mineralization opportunities, announced positive results from its diamond drilling campaign on the Bullseye property, specifically the western flank of the Appleton Fault Zone. The company successfully identified gold-bearing structures associated with the Glenwood Shear and extended the high-grade zone at the Horseshoe discovery to a greater depth. These results could enhance Exploits’ positioning in the gold exploration industry and provide insights into potential expansions in mineralized zones.

More about Exploits Discovery

Greatview Aseptic Packaging Company ( (HK:0468) ) has issued an update.

Jingfeng Holding Limited has made a voluntary conditional general cash offer to acquire all issued shares of Greatview Aseptic Packaging Company Limited, with the offer now unconditional and accepted by a significant majority of shareholders. The offeror intends to maintain the company’s listing status to enhance its international profile and attract further investments and business opportunities.

More about Greatview Aseptic Packaging Company

Greatview Aseptic Packaging Company Limited operates in the packaging industry, specializing in providing aseptic packaging solutions. The company focuses on strengthening its international profile and attracting business opportunities.

The latest announcement is out from Ten Lifestyle Group ( (GB:TENG) ).

Ten Lifestyle Group plc announced that all resolutions at their Annual General Meeting were passed, indicating strong shareholder support. This development underscores the company’s stability and commitment to sustaining its business model, potentially reinforcing its position in the concierge service industry.

More about Ten Lifestyle Group

Ten Lifestyle Group plc is a global concierge platform that enhances customer loyalty primarily for financial institutions and premium brands. The company partners with over fifty clients, including HSBC and Royal Bank of Canada, offering services in lifestyle, travel, dining, and entertainment. Ten operates under multi-year contracts generating revenue through platform-as-a-service and technology fees, supported by its proprietary technology and extensive supplier network.

data.title: Hiscox Ltd Updates Total Voting Rights and Share Structure
data.description:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Hiscox ( (GB:HSX) ) just unveiled an update.

Hiscox Ltd announced that as of January 31, 2025, its issued ordinary share capital comprises 347,509,043 Ordinary Shares, with 7,523,190 held in Treasury, which do not have voting rights. The total number of voting rights in the company stands at 339,985,853, a figure significant for shareholders to determine their reporting requirements under the Disclosure and Transparency Rules. This announcement impacts shareholders’ ability to assess their interests in the company and may influence decisions related to shareholding notifications.

More about Hiscox

Hiscox Ltd is a company operating in the insurance industry, known for offering a range of insurance products and services. It focuses primarily on niche areas and specialized insurance products, catering to specific market segments with tailored coverage options.

data.title: Arizona Sonoran Highlights 2024 Progress and 2025 Plans for Cactus Project
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Arizona Sonoran Copper Co., Inc. ( (TSE:ASCU) ) has issued an update.

Arizona Sonoran Copper Company Inc. highlighted its significant progress at the Cactus Project in 2024 and outlined its strategic goals for 2025, focusing on optimizing asset-level operations. The company is financially robust, having raised approximately $59.2 million CAD, and aims to enhance project value through ongoing studies. The 2024 Preliminary Economic Assessment indicated a strong economic potential for the Cactus Project, with after-tax NPV of $2.03 billion and an IRR of 24%, positioning it to add value across various copper price environments.

More about Arizona Sonoran Copper Co., Inc.

Arizona Sonoran Copper Company Inc. is an emerging U.S. copper developer focused on advancing the Cactus Project in Arizona. The company is engaged in the copper mining industry and aims to develop a 31-year open pit, heap leach, and SXEW operation.

data.description:

  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Orinoquia Real Estate SOCIMI SA ( (FR:MLORQ) ) has issued an update.

Orinoquia Real Estate SOCIMI S.A. has announced a dividend payment for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2024, approved by its Board of Directors. Shareholders will receive a gross dividend totaling €2,220,000, with payments scheduled through Banco Sabadell via IBERCLEAR’s systems from February 13, 2025. This move reflects the company’s commitment to delivering shareholder value and underscores its stable financial performance.

More about Orinoquia Real Estate SOCIMI SA

Orinoquia Real Estate SOCIMI S.A. is a company operating in the real estate sector, focusing on property investment and management. As a SOCIMI, it is a Spanish real estate investment trust listed on the Euronext, providing dividends to its shareholders from its property-related income.
